ANSWER TO MOTION FOR PENDENTE LITE HEARING
COMES NOW Christopher Blaine McGregor, the Respondent in the above-styled cause,
by and through his attorney of record, Tom F. Young, Jr., and for Answer to Petitionerâ€™s
Motion for Pendente Lite Hearing, says as follows:
1. The Respondent denies each and every material allegation contained in the Motion for
Pendente Lite Hearing and demands strict proof thereof. Defendant, Brittany Michelle
Gilliland has grossly misrepresented the facts in this matter.
Respectfully submitted on this the 6th day of November 2024.
/s/ Tom F. Young, Jr.
TOM F. YOUNG, JR. (YOU009)
